amendatorysection.catchline: Repealed. Laws 2014, LB749, § 298. Operative date January 1, 2017. Bylaws.
amendatorysection.para: (1) The incorporators or board of directors of a corporation shall adopt initial bylaws for the corporation.
(2) The bylaws of a corporation may contain any provision for managing the business and regulating the affairs of the corporation that is not inconsistent with law or the articles of incorporation.
